attributes.action: Ask the Queen to make Wootton Bassett, Royal Wooton Bassett
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I wish that the town of Wootton Bassett be made Royal Wootton Bassett for its total and loyal support to the Coffins returning from Afganistan and its support of the families and friends of the fallen. As a nation we need to thank this town in such a small but important way.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
